docs.title: Welcome to Squirrel Stash!
docs.text:
A quick, competitive card game for Discord; play in short bursts, chase big scores, and ruin your friends’ plans!

built with ScurryPy

docs.title: Highlights
docs.text:
• Solo or with friends

  • Low spam

  • No waiting for turns

  • Per-server leaderboard with live updates

docs.title: Features
docs.text:
• Hit 21 for huge bonuses, but bust and lose a heart!

  • Pirate steals from other players, no one's safe!

  • Gamble with the bookie, double or nothing!

  • Sculpt your hand with the Wizard, control your destiny!

Simple rules. Strategic depth. Built for Discord.

docs.title: Commands
docs.text: Command Description /play Start or resume a session /help help details /leaderboard top scores

docs.title: Additional Links
docs.text:
• Terms of Service (TOS) - the rules, specifications, and requirements for the use of the bot
  • Privacy Policy - how the bot collects, uses, shares and protects personal information

docs.title: Privacy Policy
docs.text:
This bot collects and stores Discord user IDs for the sole purpose of providing in-game functionality such as saving progress, scores, or statistics.

Data Collected:

  • Discord user IDs
  • Guild IDs

How the data is used:

  • Identify players and associate game-related data with them

Data NOT collected:

  • Messages
  • Server member lists
  • Email addresses
  • IP addresses
  • Any personal information

Data storage:

  • Data is stored securely and is not shared with third parties.

Data removal:

  • Users may request deletion of their data by contacting the bot developer or using an in-bot command if available.

Changes:

  • This policy may be updated at any time. Continued use of the bot implies acceptance of the updated policy.

Contact:

  • Visit the support server here.

Last updated: Jan 2026

docs.title: Terms of Service (TOS)
docs.text:
Terms of Service

By using this bot, you agree to the following terms.

Usage:

  • The Bot is provided for entertainment purposes only.
  • You may not use the Bot in ways that violate Discord's Terms of Service or applicable laws.

Availability:

  • The Bot is provided "as is" with no guarantee of uptime, performance, or data persistence.

Data:

  • The Bot stores Discord user IDs to provide game-related features.
  • For more information, see the Privacy Policy.

Termination:

  • Access to the Bot may be restricted or terminated at any time for any reason.

Changes:

  • These terms may change at any time. Continued use of the Bot implies acceptance of the updated terms.

Contact:

  • Visit the support server here.

Last updated: Jan 2026
